meanings.definition: Not secreting or producing a substance
meanings.sent1: The nonsecretories gland does not release any fluids.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the nonsecretories cells do not produce hormones.
meanings.sent3: The nonsecretories plant seemed to be keeping its ingredients to itself.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsecretories behavior made it hard to understand her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The nonsecretories rock held tightly onto its precious minerals.

meanings.definition: Those that do not secrete or produce a substance
meanings.sent1: The nonsecretories in the body do not have a specific function.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the nonsecretories to understand their role in the system.
meanings.sent3: The nonsecretories at the factory were not contributing to the production process.
meanings.sent4: The group of nonsecretories stood out among the active cells.
meanings.sent5: The nonsecretories were like silent observers in the bustling organ.
